EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring from the Minister of State (Infrastructure and Communities) to the Minister of Transport the Control and Supervision of the Office of Infrastructure of Canada

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: pursuant to paragraph 2(a)a of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act, transfers from the Minister of State styled Minister of State (Infrastructure and Communities) to the Minister of Transport the control and supervision of the portion of the federal public administration known as the Office of Infrastructure of Canada, and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: orders that the Minister of Transport shall preside over the Office of Infrastructure of Canada,
